tweets.text:
Can @SouthernWater get any worse?

❌The lowest @EnvAgency ranking
❌Endless pollution incidents
❌Subsidiary in a tax haven
❌£212 million profit last year but paid no corporation tax 

We are being ripped off while shareholders profit. Water privatisation has failed @We_OwnIt https://t.co/A3PKKmsobQ

The @EnvAgencyMids contractors @Drainsids are really getting stuck into this de-silt in #Hemington #Leicestershire. It’s filthy work, but will help to reduce #flood risk in the village for many years to come. https://t.co/Bay3eBr2Zw

Hatchford Brook re-naturalisation project in Elmdon Park progressing well. Concrete bed and sides removed. Gravels and cobbles added. Just spotted a kingfisher, x2 grey wagtails and a little egret  @Team4Nature @LoveSolihull @ElmdonPark @EnvAgencyMids @SolihullCouncil https://t.co/wXF7R2wkj9

Don't flush kitchen roll down the loo - it doesn't dissolve the same way as toilet paper.

Flushing it down the loo damages your pipes and can cause flooding.

To protect our environment, always put kitchen roll in the bin.

#Unblocktober https://t.co/ViFB8LlgM4

Today Project Officer Ellie Mayhew has been doing fish eDNA surveys around the Ock catchment in Oxfordshire. This is part of the Ock Arable project, linking up with farmers to help reduce diffuse pollution and improve and create freshwater habitats.
@EnvAgency @NatureMetrics https://t.co/KXNfabkK4c

The Sanway-Byfleet Flood Alleviation Scheme is being installed in a £15.5million joint project between the @EnvAgency, @wokingcouncil, @SurreyWT and @SurreyCouncil to protect homes in #Byfleet from #Floods. See https://t.co/nxDjXXnpr0 #Woking #FloodDefence #Community https://t.co/Ds0gYBYDgQ
@cumbriawildlife @EnvAgencyNW @CarlisleCC @HeritageFundNOR wish they could do this at @HorshamDC with @KeepRookwoodgrn

We're working with @BTP3Counties and @Glos_Police on a joint operation to investigate this illegal waste activity in #Gloucestershire. 

To report suspected illegal #waste activities call our hotline on 0800 807060 or @CrimestoppersUK on 0800 555 111.

#JointUnitForWasteCrime https://t.co/yOnBzr9z0H

The @EnvAgency is investigating after complaints that raw sewage discharges have “ruined” at least one shellfish business despite a million-pound investment programme to keep a river in Plymouth clean.

Acoustic Fish Deterrents are essential in protecting wildlife from power stations on the coast 🐟 But @edfenergy don't want to build one. Send a response to the Planning Inspectorate asking them to reject EDF’s appeal at https://t.co/KJNR14FUvh 🐠🐟🐡 #savesevernsfish @EnvAgency https://t.co/wfPjq2e301
